whatGet: what item do you want me to get?
provideNameAndUrl: you have to give me a name and an url.
couldntGet: couldn't find an item with this name.
provideUrl: you have to give me an url for the item.
existingItem: there's already an item with this name.
provideName: you have to give me a name of the requested item.
noPermissionsDelete: you don't have permissions to delete this resource.
helpGet:
if you give me a name of the item, I'll bring it to you. Example:
`@GEORG get niji`
You can also use the shortcut:
`%g niji`
helpCreate:
if you give me a name and an url, I'll create a new item for you. For eg.
`@GEORG create niji https://www.google.com`
helpDelete:
if you give me a name of the item, I can delete it for you if you are the author/Mod/Admin. For eg.
`@GEORG delete niji`
helpEdit:
if you give me a name and a new url, I can edit the item for you if you are the author/Mod/Admin. For eg.
`@GEORG edit niji https://www.bing.com`
helpRandom: I can bring you the most random item I can find! If you give me a word, I will get you a random item containing that word.
helpDefault: I did not recognize this command. Type `@GEORG help` for help.
helpItems: lists all items. You can also use the search-query.
help:
here's the list of commands!
`@GEORG get NAME | %g NAME`
`@GEORG create NAME URL`
`@GEORG delete NAME`
`@GEORG edit NAME URL`
`@GEORG random | @GEORG random SEARCH-WORD`
`@GEORG items | @GEORG items SEARCH-WORD`
`@GEORG wiki | @GEORG wiki WIKINAME`
For more information, type `@GEORG help COMMAND`
editNoPermissions: you don't have permissions to edit this item.
items: here is the list of all items I have:
itemsSearchCouldntFind: I couldn't find any item with this word.
noItems: there are no items yet. Go create some!
random: here's the most random thing I found!
badInput: sorry, you can't use this name.
error: uh oh, something went wrong! Please try again.
helpWiki: I can connect to the Eureka seveN Wiki and bring you a random article or I can give you a link to the article you provided.
couldntRandom: I didn't find anything with this keyword.
